processed.result: You are given an array of $n$ integers. You can swap any two adjacent elements in the array in one operation.  Determine if it is possible to rearrange the array so that no two adjacent elements are equal.
Given a list of numbers, determine if it's possible to rearrange the numbers so that no two adjacent numbers are the same, by only swapping neighboring numbers.
